QueryDefination.QueryString: select '' ChannelId, 'Outbound' Direction , dateAdd(hh, 8, CreatedDatetime) CreatedDatetime , case [Status] when 1 then 'Ready' when 2 then 'InProcess' when 3 then 'Hold' when 4 then 'Error' when 6 then 'MalformedXML' else 'UnKnown' end 'Status' , '' SourceEndPointId, DestinationEndPointId, ErrorMessage, ActionId , '' XmlDocument from AifOutboundProcessingQueue union all select ChannelId , case Direction when 1 then 'Outbound' when 2 then 'Inbound' else 'Unknown' end Direction , dateAdd(hh, 8, CreatedDatetime) CreatedDatetime , case [Status] when 1 then 'Ready' when 2 then 'InProcess' when 3 then 'Hold' when 4 then 'Error' when 6 then 'MalformedXML' else 'UnKnown' end 'Status' , SourceEndPointId, DestinationEndPointId, ErrorMessage, ActionId , MessageXml XmlDocument from AifGatewayQueue
